txt.en:
After encountering and defeating the elusive turtle, Stoneback, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Stoors of Swanfleet.

As you inspect Stoneback's shell, you marvel at its resilience. Countless slashes and would-be injuries mark its surface, but none have cut deeper than the thickness of a fingernail.

You should bring this trophy to Addo Benchuth, a trophy-hunter and purveyor of odd things in Swanfleet.
Deliver Stoneback's shell to Addo Benchuth in Swanfleet

Addo Benchuth can be found at Glyn Helyg in Swanfleet.\n\nYou have acquired a trophy from an elusive foe in Swanfleet. You should deliver it to Addo Benchuth, a trophy-hunter and purveyor of odd things in Swanfleet.
After encountering the elusive turtle, Stoneback, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Stoors of Swanfleet.

'Oh, hullo! What's that there? May I see it?'

Addo Benchuth inspects Stoneback's shell closely, running his hands along the outer side of the shell and feeling its many small imperfections. After a time, he holds the shell outward in front of him, gripping it with both hands, and for a moment, he disappears entirely behind it. With a laugh, he tilts the shell to the side and reappears.

'Oh, what fun this is! I have half a mind to ride this down the Old South Road when the snows come this year. It might be the last thing I ever do, but perhaps it would be worth it for such a thrill!

'If you find anything else of this sort, please bring it here and I'll see that you're compensated for your efforts. Thank you, friend!'
